step1.title: Guest List
step1.desc: Add the people you would like to invite.
step1.optional_note: No worries if your guest list isn't ready, you can skip this step and add guests later from the event page.
step1.upload_text: Click to upload or drag file here
step1.select_both_warning: Please select both Name and Phone columns to continue.
step1.select_all_warning: Please select Name, Phone, and Invite Count columns to continue.

step2.title: Event Details
step2.auto_adds_desc: Guest name, date/time, location, and RSVP buttons. QR and guest count are added automatically if enabled.
step2.full_message_hint: This is the exact text that will be sent (your greeting is highlighted).
step2.event_name_hint: This name is for your reference only and will not appear on the invitation
step2.default_message: We are pleased to invite you to attend the wedding ceremony of our son Muhammad, next Friday. We look forward to seeing you there.
step2.qr_desc: A special entry code will be sent to each guest
step2.guests_desc: Allow guests to bring additional invites for friends or family. If disabled, the number of invites isn't specified in the message (assumed to be 1)
step2.reminder_desc: WhatsApp reminder 24 hours before the event
step2.media_required: Please upload an invitation image or document to continue.

step3.title: Message Preview
step3.desc: This is how the invitation will appear on your guests' phones.
step3.free_create_note: Your event will be created at no cost. You'll only pay when you're ready to send invites from the dashboard.
step3.pay_later_note: You'll pay when you send invites from the dashboard.
